name: Strigoi
description:
Z & X for selections

Arrow keys to move/switch between combat menus (items vs attacks)

A RPG in the old style of NES/Game Boy games of the late 80s and early 90s. Turn based combat party building with an overworld interface. Can you master the arts of necromancy as you build an undead horde that can defeat the mysterious power that has caused the dead to rise in your village?
